sys_remote_update_set.description: - fixed the calendar notifications to not respond back to the instance when accepting/rejecting a calendar notification - modified the vcalendar template to set the RSVP field to false so a response is not sent back to the instance - changed the UID field to be the Change Request's sys_id so an item could also be removed when reassigned
sys_remote_update_set.name: 2013-05-31 Change - Fixed Calendar notifications
